TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1265
TEI.2.document_title: William Vince to Stephen F. Austin, 02-20-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1265

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Bill and receipt.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*William Vince*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p*To 400 lb. Beef @ 5¢_________ $20.00*/p* *p*" 9 Bushels @ $2__________ 18.00*/p* *p*" services rendered by 3 *person_mentioned*hands */person_mentioned*45 days @ $1__________ 45.-*/p* *p*" 45 days 2 *person_mentioned*hands */person_mentioned*2 days @ $1__________ 4.-*/p* *p* ______*/p* *p* $87.—*/p* *p*Reed, from *person_mentioned*S M Williams*/person_mentioned* a certificate of credit on my Land for the above amt.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W M Vince*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*Buffalo Bayou*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-20-1826">Feby 20. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
